评论详情: Bought these for my 16yr old and he loves them!

Love the style, love the feel, the price is fine, but I will have to return them as they came quite a bit too small & I ordered a large. I will probably have to go up 1 to 2 sizes bigger, so keep that in mind if interested. Will be purchasing again & will edit review.
4.0 sizes come true to chart holds up in wash came as shown the straps stay on no issue is comfortable priced well for what you get would recommened

These are great, they are a little big on me, but that won't stop me from using them. They are very well made and they look supper durable, they are comfortable and they look great. Other than being a little bigger than the chart size, I really enjoy them.
These are perfect. They fit amazing. They look cool and are a decent price. I would recommend these
My son is tall and slim and even getting him two size up these were not really baggy.  They wash well and my son does love them. He says they are comfortable.
These are good quality and the details look really cool. They fit true to size. They look nice and washed well without fading.

评论概述: Modern trip pants for small butts
评论详情: I love these pants. I have been wearing trip pants since I was in high school but these are probably my favorite pair. The fabric is very high quality, heavy, and durable. And the cut is extremely flattering on me and my body shape (I’m a skinny person). I feel so comfortable in this fit. Highly recommend 10/10
Really good quality pants. Fabric is thick and sturdy. Unfortunately sizing is off you need to size up maybe even double.

I’ve got them a few days ago and the quality on them is perfect. If you know how to style them they will look similar to the picture. Price wise they are worth it but make sure you have a outfit in mind before buying as they are unique to style with!

These pants look a little darker and less textured in person. They also are pretty tight and don't sit around my ankle, higher than the picture shows. They also are not that baggy. This is all before the was so they are likely going to shrink. I would recommend getting a size up. Also the 'straps' don't really do much and just sort of swing around when walking. The quality seems pretty good though.
